title: why do i even have extra buttons
body: trying really hard to incorporate the side buttons on my mouse into gameplay so i can have an easier time ward hoping and things like that. but the buttons dont register in game. i changed the key binding from the client, but once i get to practice tool, the binding are set but it doesnt respond when i press them. pls tell me you can help c:

replies.body: You're going to want to rebind those extra mouse buttons while you're in a custom or practice game! As of right now, the client options doesn't recognize those mouse buttons beyond 1 & 2, but you should be able to get them set when you're in a game.
giving it a shot right now then
If you are setting the hotkey to a side button to your mouse, you should revert that and just set your side button to the letter of each hotkey.
i have tried both, and tested them out of the client and they responded as i wished, but once im in the client something is making it not respond to my buttons
